.iframe-container {
  position: relative;
  height: calc(100vh - 50px);
  padding-top: 56.25%;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.iframe-container iframe {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border: 0;
}

/* rmarkdown html documents */
.main-container {
  padding: 0;
  max-width: 100%;
}

body {
  overflow-y: hidden;
}

#header {
  display: none;
}

/* pkgdown articles */
.template-article {
  padding-left: 0;
  padding-right: 0;
  width: 100%;
}

.row {
  margin: 0;
}

.contents {
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
}

.page-header {
  display: none;
}
